mainDesc: Welcome to our cozy new renovated two-bedroom apartment with romantic sea view from it's balcony. Property is located 450 meters from the Diocletian palace, 80 meters from the sea and 800 meters from the beach. Building, where apartment is situated, was build between 16th and 17th century. Upper parts are built in 1840. Inside courtyard one can see remains of the chapel of St. Peter and Paul (property has of a cultural asset and partial protection of historical structures). Apartment Bepina consists of an air-conditioned living room with smart TV, WIFI, a fully equipped kitchen (hob, oven, refrigerator, dishwasher, toaster, kettle, utensils and dishes), 1st bedroom with a double bed (160x200), air condition, smart TV, 2nd bedroom for 1-2 people (80-160x200) and smart TV, bathroom with shower, washing machine. The apartment has a balcony with a beautiful seaview. Towels and bed linen are available. Nearby there are many restaurants, shops, pharmacy, doctor, tourist agencies, rent a car, sights...
